titleStmt.title: The Protestants practice, or The compleat Christian. Being the true and perfect way to the celestiall Canaan. Necessary for the bringing up of young and the estabilshing of old Christians in the faith of the Gospel: the use whereof in families will preserve them from the errors of the times. / By a Reverend Father of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Davies, Athanasius, b. 1620 or 21.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for Lodowyke Lloyd at the Castle in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: Reverend father of the Church of England=Anthanasias Davies.Cf.Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
